column5: Can I borrow your spring?  'Coz mine sucks big time in comparison.  WTG, thanks for sharing!
truly spectacular, i don't think i've caught that many trophy fish in my life let alone the spring.  well done look forward to seeing your summer monsters    Peps
The pictures are great, I can't even imagine the moments of excitement as those fish were being brought into the boat... Awesome spring! WTG  Jen
One word AMAZING!  Easton
Yowzers  Those are some mighty big fish.  Way to go Raf.  Joey
Great report there Raf....looks like you had one hell of a spring!
Simply....amazing .  ...those are all very impressive catches for sure,well done i can only dream of a spring like that way to go..  ...thanks for making me drool......cheers
AS ALWAYS VERY NICE !!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Those aren't from a 'spring's' worth Raf....those were two weekends, remember?! One in April and two weeks ago for pike opener. Four days fishin (Sunday's always a half-day, too). On  the trip with HipTrip, 350 pics were shot on three cameras. There have been a few pics left out ha ha. Look out walleye this wknd! Really notice a difference in Raf's/Ben's cameras vs. mine too, no contest in terms of photo quality.
congrats them lakers are brutes nice fish btw may i ask what  u were using for the big lakers
Wow, what a season wrap-up. You guys had a helluva season, those are beautiful fish. Congrats to everyone on the PBs!  Mike
Stellar report guys. Thanks for sharing.
great job Raf!
Wow...great start to the season bud! If the rest of your season carries on like that your in for a heck year! Thanks for shareing.

FinS, the usual suspects, spoons, spinners and minnow baits.  We'd sometimes take a hot bait off just to see what else we can get to work.  I think LipDip has an article on ice-out trout in the March or April '06 OFC newsletter that summarizes this topic well.  Thanks gang.  Spring is a great time of the year, air is crisp, trees are budding, wildlife is abundant.  Don't wait till the end of may or you'll miss some of the best fishn to be had.

to me, May 2-4 pretty much symbolizes the end of spring, beginning of summer.  sure the nights have been cold and it may not quite feel like summer yet but sure as shoot we'll be complaining about the stifling heat soon enough.  not sure yet if I will be out this weekend or not but i thought i'd post a photo summary of how the spring season has gone.  'eeeeeeeeeere we go  first fish didnt take very long    or the 2nd    there were some double headers    and double releases    some great action          and some nice fish        yeah, even some personal bests          fabulous sunsets    ...and best of all, FISH WITH TEETH!    Bring on the summer!
Yipes, those are some serious fish!  Where were you, Great Slave Lake?
Wow, that is truly unbelievable, incredible fish!
Very nice Raf, some sweet fish already and just getting started.
Mama-Mia ! Spectacular ! You boys never fail to put monstrous fish in the boat !
Wow!  Congratulations on a successful Spring - you got some beauties there.  Very jealous! 007

very nice catches!! i am going to miss spring, cool weather, damp mornings, awesome working conditions for the job i do, but i look forward to summer, the weight loss(lol)long hours = more money, and the long walks on the beach front during a nice evening with that special someone, Bass opener   .... Bud
I dunno.... OK results I guess..?.?.? lol.   Nice stuff Dip, Raf and Ben.
Another great one Raf.  Hopefully, your summer will be just as successful!  I'm sure you're counting the days to get back to the French. Thanks for the report.  Looking forward to more.
awesome pics!  well done. lookin forward to seein what you pull out this summer.  cheers!
wow guys solid line up there.....not much more to say
Man oh man.... that'd be the envy of anyone! You guys always do great. Thanks so much for taking the time to share.
Well done men!!!
Great fishin' boys.   Good to see fish like that.
Dang those are some GREAT fish, and amazing photo's, well worth the wait on dial up as always.  Thanks for taking the time to share and I know your summer will be even better.  Maureen
Wow if that was your spring I cant wait to see what your summer is like, I can only hope my season goes half that well.
NIIIIIICE!
Nice job, you guys are off to a great start.  Best to you for a super season.
Awesome pics Raf and you've been in some gome company!  Whopper
Wow...what a spring season!!  Congrats on lots of great looking fish and especially setting some personal bests.  Cant wait to see what you bring in during the summer!
As always,super report and the pic,s were awesome.Some rteal nice brutes there.So was that dip or lip with you there? LOL  Thanks for sharing Raf.
Wow! Very nice spring indeed!
BRILLIANT RAF!  I love the water shots.  Great report
wow, thanks for sharing those pics. Looks like you guys have been busy!
Great pictures Raf, nice to see you guys are still nailing them! Did you loan JP a coat? No duct tape on that one, LOL.
